reviewText: The story was good except they kept saying you have to believe but didn't say in what you must believe.  Being a Christmas story, I would assume you must believe in Jesus because that is the reason for the season. Right?
GREAT
This is an OK kids movie.  My kids weren't crazy about it, but it was cute.
This movie is a wonderful movie for all ages and teaches children what is important.  It is a favorite of all my grandchildren's. You can't go wrong with this film.
It wasn't as good as the other films that I ordered for my niece.  It did not keep her attention
Watched this movie with my grandkids and we all loved it.  From the time the movie started, nobody moved.  It was great!

My grandsons really enjoyed the movie The Littlest Light On The Christmas Tree.  They are 1 and three years old and were fascinated with the whole idea of Christmas trees and a ball that magically came to life.

I purchased this for my 5 year old who loves Christmas stories. The story itself is really interesting and cute, but the animation is atrocious. Creepy looking adults and they move strangely; it's like someone animated this for a school project. I know teenagers who can animate better than this.
This is a very sweet movie..great music too.  My 3 year old watches it several time over the holiday season.

This is one of the worst animations that I have ever seen.  From stereotypical characters to poor animation to poor story writing and bad music, this video has all you've never wanted in a holiday film.
The movie arrived in a timely manner and about the time we expected it. The animation was very interesting, not as good as the cover leads you to believe, but interesting to watch. Adorable story.
I have never heard of this movie. Very sweet. It's a nice addition to the rest of my Christmas movie collection.

This was the second of 3 DVD boxes opened Christmas day for my 5 yr old daughter and also failed due to being the wrong Region. I ordered from Indonesia for delivery to Indonesia and it was a DVD for another Region. Well done AMAZON !!

Not great or original, the part I like best of this movie is the digital generated images, very well done..the tale is not very interesting, kids may like it, not sure,.may not be a holiday classic, but was good.
Great Message, good story....  Not up to the standards of big budget animation, so don't miss the message because your focused on the technical details....
Couldn't make it through the first 5 minutes due to the horrible animation. It looks like one of the very first computer animated movies ever created. Looks more like a cheap video game.

My mom originally found this movie at a dollar tree 4 years ago and it was a dollar well spent. My daughter was about 7 months old and was entertained the whole time. It was the only movie she would watch without getting bored and now 4 years later my son is hooked on this adorable Christmas movie. Animation is different from any other movie but I don't think it's a big deal it's still an adorable movie !
Great Christmas story from the late Lynne Lewis and her husband.
You will love this movie.

I saw all the ratings and figured this would be great for my 3 year old nephew. We all sat down to watch it and I have to say I was embarrassed how bad the graphics were and the story drug out so long it was hard to follow.
my  grand babies  loved it thats why i  got  it .there is not  much more i can say  thanks ok
Family movie, christmas spirit, great for all ages. Popular stars as voices, enjoyable, great for all the members of the family
Yes! All of our kids loved this! :)  It's charming!  It's simple, it's lovely!  Glad we got this one for sure! :)

I love this movie, so do my kids age 2 through 7.  Sweet, simple, and has a plot also.  I like to give it at a gift since it is very reasonably priced.  True that there is no "Jesus" in it, but the themes of the season... joy, compassion, friendship, giving... they are all there.
